page.title: 15COMMUNITY HEALTH IN CLYRO
page.content: The majority of people in the district travel a mile into{Hay}to receive any medical, dental or chiropody attention. The nearest hospital serving the area is in { {Hereford,}23 miles away. Powys Health Authority provide a home nursing service consisting of community midwives and community nursing sisters. The{midwives}visit new mothers and babies up to ten days post-natally.{Community nurses}provide care and treatment to both the physically and mentally ill. The{ {Health Visitor}looks after the welfare and development of the pre school child and during its primary school life. An{ambulance}service will provide transport out of the area to a {day hospital, out patients clinic and {physiotherapy departments. }
